nodes.title: Fix a international Character encoding bug.
Some APIs require fields in a particular order.
it seems that the URLEncoder doesnt encode the damn spaces
allow client to specify charset for response
Fix issue #13 - Basic Auth works in conjunction with multipart
Add method to set the default HttpClient
add PlainURL option for HttpRequest.
bug fix for Multipart File Upload
Cookie support
Bump version from 3.11.11 to 3.11.12 in README.md
Fix a flaky test.
Make primary instance initialized lazily

Update pom.xml sample
replace Spark with Javalin
Remove redundant dependencies

Fix useSystemProperties
Removed redundant access modifiers, fixed typos and simplified some assertions
Test the PR verify
Support for custom ciphers and protocols for https requests

Fix confusing sentence in README

typo in docs/README.md
Add download progress monitor
Fix typo

Fix maven.yml format

expose ttl on connection pool as a viable config

Remove dependecy httpclient and core from httpasyncclient

add useSystemProperties to default HTTPClients

upgrade deps
#181 make UnirestException a RuntimeException
maven: added profile to create a shaded uber jar
Replace org.json JSON library by Android SDK's cleanroom implementation

Options

Defer body parsing until getBody() is called.

fix for #141 and #137
